title: A world without words?
kq: KQ: What role does language play in our lives?
more: This podcast follows three different stories that help us imagine the role language plays in our existence and consciousness.

title: Comedian George Carlin on "Soft Language"
kq: KQ: How does language help us communicate knowledge? Why do the words we choose matter?
more: This segment is from a 1980s comedy special from the comedian George Carlin. Here he discusses, with some vulgar language, why he thinks humans choose words and language that avoids direct communication.

title: Describing colors as a blind person
kq: KQ: What is the relationship between language and sense perception? To what extent is our ability to communicate knowledge through language limited?
more: This video allows us to hear from a blind person the inability for words to adequately communicate the concept of color.

title: Do animals have language?
kq: KQ: What is language? Do animals have language?
more: This podcast episode looks into what language is and how animals may or may not use language to communicate.
